title: Release Document for Fabrication
description: A detailed drawing for a steel structure is complete and needs to be sent to a fabrication shop.

tasks.description: Verify the drawing has been fully approved and is at the 'Issued for Construction' revision.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the drawing is ready for fabrication.

tasks.description: Create a transmittal to the selected fabrication shop.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent initiates a new transmittal record.

tasks.description: Attach the drawing and any relevant specifications to the transmittal and issue it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the complete fabrication package to the vendor.
